content.question: Which of the following statements best describes the chordal seventh in measure 2 ?

choices.label: The chordal seventh resolves at the end of measure 2.
The chordal seventh resolves at the beginning of measure 3.
The chordal seventh resolves at the end of measure 3.
The chordal seventh is not resolved.

content.answer: The chordal seventh resolves at the end of measure 3.

unit.text: 5: Harmony and Voice Leading II - Chord Progressions and Predominant Function

skill.text: Skill 2.E: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply harmonic, melodic, and rhythmic procedures of 18th-century voice leading (up to 4 voices) in notated music.
